title: Senior Web Developer
full_description: Senior Web Developer Senior Web Developer - Skills Required - PHP, HTML, JavaScript, Web DevelopmentIf you are a Web Developer who is interested in working for a smaller company where your impact with be felt and your ideas will be heard, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with Us We have the stability of a company that has been around for over 20 years with the agility of a startup - We are growing faster than ever, come aboard and help us be our best selves - Great Work:Life balanceWhat You Will Be DoingUsing your phenomenal Web Development skills to engineer a customer experience that is second to none!What You Need for this Position Successful track record in Web Development - Some experience with using the following technologies: PHP, MySQL, REACT, JavaScript, iOS - Desire to join a small team and have a big impact!We are actively interviewing so APPLY TODAY!Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.*Senior Web DeveloperAL-HuntsvilleML-1583828*
